DOC.brief_summary: Aim of the study is the evaluation of the effects (psychological and physiological) of an hrv-biofeedback training, a mindfulness training and a combination of both training methods for stress reduction.
DOC.brief_title: Comparative Intervention Study of Stress Reduction in Corporate Health Management
DOC.criteria: Healthy adults Working in the business in which the study is conducted Cardiac disease Thyroid disease (intake of glucocorticoids) Actual psychological illness Intake of psychotropic drugs Intake of other medication changing HRV
